name: Plug It! (Amir Dayyef)
description:
This Is My Submission for the Gamemaker Game Jam!

This Is My First Full Game Release and It Has Been Drawn and Coded in 120 Hours.

Plug It! Is a Game About 2 Plugs Trying to Bring the Dark Town Back to Light!

Find SocketX and SocketY and Connect Them to Their Matching Plug.

There Are 7 Levels in Plug It! Every Level Is Designed and Coded Differently New Challenge, New Obstacle.

After You Plugged the Two Plugs the Room Will Transform into a Neon-Themed Room.

Have Fun and Don't Break Your Mouse.

-Amir Dayyef
